newsitem.title: CHINA: China executes eight for violent jailbreak.
newsitem.headline: China executes eight for violent jailbreak.

text.p: Authorities in China's southwestern Guizhou province have executed eight prisoners convicted of taking part in a violent jailbreak, the Guizhou Daily said.
The eight were shot after a mass sentencing in a prison in the provincial capital of Guiyang on November 18, the newspaper said in an edition seen in Beijing on Saturday.
They had been convicted of taking part in an attempt to escape from prison in which several guards and inmates were killed and injured, it said but gave no details.
Court officials also cut the sentences of seven inmates who performed meritous deeds during the attempted jailbreak, the newspaper said but did not elaborate.
